name: pokemon blue crystal 3d
description:
just started making pokemon blue in 3d using crystal style graphics, pallet town is is almost finished with interiors needing a lot of work done, no battles or npcs. just walking using wasd and mouse for camera. made in unity and modeled in magicavoxel.

no invisible boundaries so be careful to not walk off map.

packages used in unity are cinemachine and probuilder.
